column3: Traffic;Kampong Cham: A tanker truck transporting gasoline overturned at 7.15 on the morning of September 28
column5: along National Road 61 at the western side of Srebb village in Sambor district.------The 49 year old driver escaped without injury.------Deputy Inspector-General said that after the accident
column6: a local firefighting unit arrived on the scene to prevent a fire from happening.------The police forces kept people away. After the scene was made safe
column7: the company took other vehicles to pump out the fuel to transport it to the destination.------https://kohsantepheapdaily.com.kh/article/712614.html
